newsitem.title: USA: Martin Marietta Materials restructures unit.
newsitem.headline: Martin Marietta Materials restructures unit.

text.p: Martin Marietta Materials Inc said Monday it restructured its aggregates business, creating five operating divisions.

The new structure combines all North Carolina operations into one major operating unit and combines the South Carolina and Florida operations with Georgia and Alabama to form a southeast division, the company said.

"The change to a divisional structure will enable more support services to be provided from the field operating offices, as opposed to the central corporate staff," said Stephen Zelnak Jr, Martin Marietta Material's president and chief executive officer.
Martin Marietta Materials produces construction aggregates and magnesia-based chemical and refractory products.
